thread.title: First Great Western due to strike over bank holiday | West Country (W)
thread.title_full: First Great Western due to strike over bank holiday | West Country (W) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: First Great Western due to strike over bank holiday | West Country (W)
text:
RMT @RMTunion Follow RMT names new strike dates on First Great Western as company fails to address core issues http://t.co/gyglXUrFnf http://t.co/asY7rbWy0c
12:45 - 3 Aug 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Rail workers on First Great Western trains are to stage a series of strikes, including over the August Bank Holiday weekend.
The RMT union has announced the strikes following a row over new trains.
All RMT members have been told not to work for 24 hours from one minute past midnight on Sunday 23rd August and again from midnight on Saturday 29th August until 11:59pm on Monday 31st.
Last updated Mon 3 Aug 2015 Travel First Great Western Strikes
